sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>94</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/94</github_url> <message>Rest API Explorer Tip: While testing API, you can consider adding "X-WantSessionDebugMessages" as true in API header to access debugging information.</message> <number>TIL0001097</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-12 09:50:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>48939efd2fbe011051dad5f62799b665</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-18 07:16:14</sys_updated_on> <title>Debugging in Rest API Explorer</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
